s.text: The paper doesn't say whether the lawyer meant Tripp tricked ML into misstatements or physically edited the tape to be misleading.

The paper points out that the privilege issue presents Starr with a Hobson's choice: fight the notion and divert significant resources to a long court battle, or don't fight it and forgo some key witnesses.
The piece flatly states that Iraq has run an elaborate germ weapons program and that it "had made enough deadly microbes to kill all the people on earth several times over."
